formalpara.title: With Visual Studio 2008
formalpara.para: Simply open Flash Card Master.sln in Visual Studio and build.

formalpara.title: With Visual Studio Express 2008
formalpara.para: Simply open Flash Card Master.sln in Visual Studio and build. You can download it from <http://www.microsoft.com/express/vcsharp/>

listitem.para: You may need .NET Framework 3.5 SDK. Get it from Microsoft website.
Execute Build-Release.bat file in the source root directory. MSBuild tool is used to perform the build.
